title: Liverpool
name: MelloMello
hours: Offers a full menu of breakfast, lunch & mains daily from 10AM-8PM
content: Fiercely independent, eco and ethically aware cafe. Features all organic, local beer, cider, wines, spirits, teas, and coffee. Their entire menu is vegetarian with vegan options. They serve vegan & gluten free cakes on rotation, and specialise in organic & international alcoholic beverages. Healthy vegetarian menu and specials daily.
